title: Mass spectrometry
creator_credit: John Wiley and Sons, Communications Group West, Robert L Pescok, James L. Sudmeier and Mallory Pearce
brief_description: Presents the technique of mass spectrometry, shows how the instrument operates, how a mass spectrum is obtained, the relationship between precise molecular weight and the chemical formula, and some of the common ways in which molecules fragment. Intended for classes in analytical and organic chemistry.
